## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G20870](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G20870)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATFAH2, FAH2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS FATTY ACID HYDROXYLASE 2, fatty acid hydroxylase 2
- **Description:**   fatty acid hydroxylase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
